mapper.select: select p.pet_seq, p.pet_name, p.pet_birthday, p.pet_img, p.pet_neutering, p.pet_disease, p.pet_kind, p.pet_color from USER_GROUP g, PET p where g.group_seq = p.group_seq and p.group_seq = #{VALUE}
mapper.insert: insert into PET(group_seq, pet_name, pet_birthday, pet_gender, pet_img, pet_neutering, pet_disease, pet_kind, pet_color) values (#{groupSeq}, #{petName}, #{petBirthday}, #{petGender}, #{petImg}, #{petNeutering}, #{petDisease}, #{petKind}, #{petColor})
